Title: Automated API Docs Generator using Generative AI
Abstract: our study provides an improvement on the creation of application programming interfaces  application programming interface  usage documentation using the efficiency and power of generative artificial intelliegence. application programming interface play an important role in software integration and software maintenance but the process of application programming interface documentation creation has been traditional and did not evolve with time this paper employs generative artificial intelliegence to enhance the accuracy speed and scale of application programming interface documentation generation. the automated application programming interface documentation generator is created using natural language processing applied through a large language model  tinypixel llama 2 7b bf16 sharded model . training data was created by applying web scraping on various large tech companies' documentation web pages to get a good quality and industry standard documentation dataset. it was further diversified and increased using the gpt model to handle a wide range of application programming interface scenarios. the fine tuning greatly enhanced the tinypixel llama 2 7b bf16 sharded model efficiency and quality of output which is proven by the reduced response time and the accuracy of documentation generated. our study comparative study confirms the effectiveness of the approach used. our study conclusion offers a comprehensive approach that should improve software development processes and pave the way for additional developments in application programming interface documentation.
